attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as a county should withdraw from the EU as the EU is wasting our money which can be used to help our Pensioners to live a life they fought for. THe EU is also slowly taking control of every day British life

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/JoinEFTA/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
